Author: qimon
Title: Bopti the first dedicated token to the construction industry #airdrop alert
Body: Following the success of Domraider's ICO, the French startup H-EQUITIES launched its pre ICO on october 27, 2017, in order to create the first Crypto-currency dedicated to the construction industry, a worldwide market valued at 15,5 trillion dollars in 2030.  BOPTI is a reward token for the users of BATOPTi App , this App is currently using by 30 000 peoples to help them to manage their constructions sites .  The company was founded 4 years ago and complete a first round seed investment of 100k euros at the beginning of 2017     Bopti will issue 200,000,000 token (crypto coin) during this ICO. The token need was estimated by the company at a level of 1.5 billion in 2021 (BATOPTI targets 3,000,000 users by this date), which suggests a sharp increase in the value of the token.  It will be possible to subscribe to the ICO by Credit Card, Transfer, or payment in Bitcoin or Ethereum.  These funds will allow the international development of the company . The business model is similar as facebook , the Apps is free and we sell targeted advertisement to companies.   For further check please our website www.bopti.eu whitepaper : http://www.bopti-ico.org/documents/WPBOPTIV111en.pdf  Stay tunes we will have a airdrop soon that we will post here .  Apps on apple store :   https://itunes.apple.com/fr/app/batopti/id1199479930?l=fr&mt=8 Apps on google play :  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hiapps.batopti&hl=fr

Author: ImHash
Title: Bopti the first dedicated token to the construction industry #airdrop alert
Body: You sure it's a trillion dollars business? Because my 4 years old cousin could post this thread with better pictures I thought Social was the next FaceBook, But you are apparently. More power. We need a rest room and toilet, How much would those cost us? I think we're dead by the time we could actually use your application.
